definitions.definition: The act of dissipating or dispersing ; a state of dispersion or separation ; dispersion; waste .
A dissolute course of life, in which health, money, etc., are squandered in pursuit of pleasure; profuseness in immoral indulgence, as late hours, riotous living, etc.; dissoluteness .
A trifle which wastes time or distracts attention.
A loss of energy , usually as heat , from a dynamic system.

main_definition: The act of dissipating or dispersing ; a state of dispersion or separation ; dispersion; waste .
secondary_definitions: A dissolute course of life, in which health, money, etc., are squandered in pursuit of pleasure; profuseness in immoral indulgence, as late hours, riotous living, etc.; dissoluteness .
A trifle which wastes time or distracts attention.
( physics ) A loss of energy , usually as heat , from a dynamic system.
